Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all Board methods, retrieving fields, edges and corners.

        aY - Corner axial y-coordinate
        dir - Corner direction (0 = North, 1 = South)

        Parameters:

        aY - Edge axial y-coordinate
        dir - Edge index/direction (0 = NorthWest, 1 = NorthEast, 2 = East)

      • getNeighbouringFields

        public Field[] getNeighbouringFields(int aX,
                                     int aY)
        Get neighbouring fields of the specified field with the following order:

        {NorthEast, East, SouthEast, SouthWest, West, NorthWest}

        Parameters:
        aX - Field axial x-coordinate
        aY - Field axial y-coordinate

      • getTouchingFields

        public Field[] getTouchingFields(int aX,
                                 int aY,
                                 int dir)
        Get fields that touch the specified corner with the following order:

        For Northern corner (i = 0): {NorthEast, South, NorthWest}

        For Southern corner (i = 1): {North, SouthEast, SouthWest}

        Parameters:
        aX - Corner axial x-coordinate
        aY - Corner axial y-coordinate
        dir - Corner index/direction (0 = North, 1 = South)

      • getConnectedFields

        public Field[] getConnectedFields(int aX,
                                  int aY,
                                  int dir)
        Get fields that are connected to the specified edge with the following order:

        For NorthWestern edge (i = 0): {NorthWest, SouthEast}

        For NorthEastern edge (i = 1): {NorthEast, SouthWest}

        for Eastern edge (i = 2): {West, East}

        Parameters:
        aX - Edge axial x-coordinate
        aY - Edge axial y-coordinate
        dir - Edge index/direction (0 = NorthWest, 1 = NorthEast, 2 = East)

      • getSurroundingCorners

        public Corner[] getSurroundingCorners(int aX,
                                      int aY)
        Get all surrounding corners of a field with the following order:

        {North, NorthEast, SouthEast, South, SouthWest, NorthWest}

        Parameters:
        aX - Field axial x-coordinate
        aY - Field axial y-coordinate

      • getAdjacentCorners

        public Corner[] getAdjacentCorners(int aX,
                                   int aY,
                                   int dir)
        Get corners that are adjacent to the specified corner with the following order:

        For Northern corner (i = 0): {North, SouthEast, SouthWest}

        For Southern corner (i = 1): {NorthEast, South, NorthWest}

        Parameters:
        aX - Corner axial x-coordinate
        aY - Corner axial y-coordinate
        dir - Corner index/direction (0 = North, 1 = South)

      • getAttachedCorners

        public Corner[] getAttachedCorners(int aX,
                                   int aY,
                                   int dir)
        Get corners that are attached to the specified edge with the following order:

        For NorthWestern edge (i = 0): {NorthEast, SouthWest}

        For NorthEastern edge (i = 1): {NorthWest, SouthEast}

        for Eastern edge (i = 2): {North, South}

        Parameters:
        aX - Edge axial x-coordinate
        aY - Edge axial y-coordinate
        dir - Edge index/direction (0 = NorthWest, 1 = NorthEast, 2 = East)

      • getBorderingEdges

        public Edge[] getBorderingEdges(int aX,
                                int aY)
        Get bordering edges of a field with the following order:

        {NorthEast, East, SouthEast, SouthWest, West, NorthWest}

        Parameters:
        aX - Field axial x-coordinate
        aY - Field axial y-coordinate

      • getProjectingEdges

        public Edge[] getProjectingEdges(int aX,
                                 int aY,
                                 int dir)
        Get edges that are projected to the specified corner with the following order:

        For Northern corner (i = 0): {North, SouthEast, SouthWest}

        For Southern corner (i = 1): {NorthEast, South, NorthWest}

        Parameters:
        aX - Corner axial x-coordinate
        aY - Corner axial y-coordinate
        dir - Corner index/direction (0 = North, 1 = South)

      • getLinkedEdges

        public Edge[] getLinkedEdges(int aX,
                             int aY,
                             int dir)
        Get edges that are linked to the specified edge with the following order:

        For NorthWestern edge (i = 0): {North, SouthEast, South, NorthWest}

        For NorthEastern edge (i = 1): {North, NorthEast, South, SouthWest}

        for Eastern edge (i = 2): {NorthEast, SouthEast, SouthWest, NorthWest}

        Parameters:
        aX - Edge axial x-coordinate
        aY - Edge axial y-coordinate
        dir - Edge index/direction (0 = NorthWest, 1 = NorthEast, 2 = East)
